title: Game glitched now account messed up?
body:
Was queued for an ARAM, we all got a message seconds before the char select finished and the game popped that our group was disbanded for server maintenance.  Then the game popped anyway and we went in. Finished the game, did not get credit for the first win of the day. But when I went to re-queue for anything got a "cannot form lobby" error message, no matter the game type.  I figured a logout/login might fix it.  Now I get an error message that I could not log into my account due to basically "something being wrong" (no duh!) I that certain game types were down (could see that in queueing) but there's nothing on server status about servers as a whole down.  I basically sit on "Authenticating" for forever when I try to login.  And then get that error message.  Anything up?

Incidently the error message was "An unexpected error occured while logging in.  Please try again.  If this issue persists, contact suport at .." which link takes you to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/115001242867  Which has no useful category for this.  (And also has the "show all" in the categories that do exist simply listing the same 1-4 listings that were already visible before you clicked "show all", This is a possible layout flaw you might want to look into as .. it comes of as somewhat incompetent)
